features.name: Create Page Builder
features.description: Two-pane builder with filters, API fetch, drag-and-drop to compose a question paper, reorder and export to PDF.

features.name: Backend API and Seeding
features.description: Express + SQLite server that seeds sample questions and exposes /api/questions and /api/filter-options endpoints.

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Shared UI components (Select, Card, Button, Checkbox, etc.) used across the app.

features.name: PDF Generation
features.description: Utility to generate exam PDFs (legacy util). The current create page uses inline jsPDF generation.

features.name: Site Shell
features.description: Main layout, header, footer and hero section with CTA redirecting to /start -> /create.
